comment.text: May play a role in anchoring the cytoskeleton to the plasma membrane.

Homodimer. Interacts with the syntrophins SNTA1; SNTB1 and SNTB2. Interacts with SYNM. Interacts (via its WWW and ZZ domains) with DAG1 (via the PPXY motif of betaDAG1); the interaction is inhibited by the tyrosine phosphorylation of the PPXY motif of DAG1.
Isoform 1 has high expression in muscle. Isoforms Up70 and Up140 were found in all the adult and fetal tissues tested and relatively abundant in lung and kidney.
Actin binding affinity is primarily determined by CH domain 1.

property.value: EGR2 and SOX10-mediated initiation of Schwann cell myelination
Expressed in calcaneal tendon and 227 other tissues
P:regulation of sodium ion transmembrane transporter activity
P:response to denervation involved in regulation of muscle adaptation
